title: 5.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Zara used the ASCII encoding system to convert the word ‘mobile’ into binary form. Her result is shown below:
1101101 110 1111 1101010 1101001 1111100 1100101
Circle the incorrect bits in the above binary representation, if any. Write the correct binary representation below
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
